comment.body:
> Please test when all filters are disabled. If no issue - enable them(previously disabled) one by one with checking.

Seems to be an issue with AdGuard Tracking Protection

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.facebook.com/marketplace/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fmarketplace%2F) ### Comment > Facebook Marketplace ads are leaking through the filters and dns protection.
